site_name: Site Of Former Northolt Grange Community Centre And Part Of St Raphael's Catholic School
decision_conditions: The submitted details of the Noise assessment report in pursuant to condition 14 of planning permission ref: 220545FULR3 dated 23/05/2023 has been deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition as the assessment was taken in abnormal conditions. The information provided fails to ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site is not adversely affected by noise, in accordance with policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policies 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D6 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), Ealing's SPG10 and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description:
Submission of a Noise assessment report in pursuant to condition 14 of planning permission ref: 220545FULR3 dated 23/05/2023 for 'Development of 92 residential dwellings (Use Class C3) with associated vehicular and pedestrian access across three buildings ranging from two to five storeys in height, children play space, residential amenity space, public realm and landscaping works, a new public open space, vehicle and cycle parking and other associated works. (Following demolition of the existing community centre, school building, playground, MUGA and associated structures) [Regulation 3 Application by London Borough of Ealing]
'
